preclusion: L4476V/LL5476V/LLJ5476V/LL6476V US Copyright: International & Comparative Perspectives
description: This is a course in U.S. copyright law, both traditional and digital, in international and comparative perspective. Some of the specific topics we will cover are the subject matter of copyright; ownership; duration and transfer; infringement; fair use; and the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.
title: US Copyright: International & Comparative Perspectives
prerequisite: NUS Compulsory Core Law Curriculum or common law equivalent.
